snippet.title: The Light In The Darkness [XOne/XSX/PC] Debut Trailer
snippet.description:
The Light In The Darkness is an educational historical experience about the Holocaust in France.

More details here: https://worthplaying.com/game/15862-the-light-in-the-darkness/

The Light in the Darkness is coming to Xbox and PC in 2022 and will be free-to-play.

#TheLightInTheDarkness #videogames #WorthPlaying #WorthPlayingvideos
